about_the_game:
3 vs 3 top-down multiplayer action! Work together with your team to collect information, outmaneuver the enemy, and secure victory!

Spotfight is a 3 vs 3 action game where teams go up against each other in a tug-of-war style match. The match consists of a series of encounters with different objectives, winning an encounter grants a point in the overall match, whoever gathers enough points, or is in the lead when the clock runs out, wins!

Features


  • Use your vision cone to keep track of enemies and share information with your teammates! Outmaneuver the enemy and use the flow of information to your advantage!

  • Fight together with your team in a multi-discipline battle, with encounters ranging from Team-Deathmatch to Deliver-The-Payload, and more!

  • Each encounter plays out on a different map! Adapt to the ever-changing locations and use your knowledge from previous rounds to your advantage!
